TheForsaken:PlagueDoctorEvent.NAME: Plague Doctor
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across a strange person standing before several sick and dying #p~plague~ #p~victims.~ NL He turns to you and offers #g~A~ #g~strange~ #g~mask.~
You take the #g~mask,~ but start to feel a little #r~feverish.~
You refuse the offer and continue on your way.
